name: port
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Port resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`port-labs` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/port-labs/terraform-provider-port-labs).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Port resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/port-labs/terraform-provider-port-labs)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-port` repo](https://github.com/port-labs/pulumi-port/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-port-labs` repo](https://github.com/port-labs/terraform-provider-port-labs/issues).

> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,

> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-port-labs` repo](https://github.com/port-labs/terraform-provider-port-labs/issues).

org.description: Required when selecting type AZURE. The Azure org that the workflow belongs to

payload.description: The Azure Devops workflow payload to encode arrays or objects. Learn about how to [define the action payload](https://docs.getport.io/create-self-service-experiences/setup-backend/#define-the-actions-payload).

webhook.description: Required when selecting type AZURE. The Azure webhook that the workflow belongs to

repo.description: Required when selecting type GITHUB. The GitHub repo that the workflow belongs to

reportWorkflowStatus.description: Report the workflow status when invoking the action

workflow.description: The GitHub workflow that the action belongs to

workflowInputs.description: The GitHub workflow inputs to encode arrays or objects. Learn about how to [define the action payload](https://docs.getport.io/create-self-service-experiences/setup-backend/#define-the-actions-payload).

defaultRef.description: The default ref of the action

groupName.description: Required when selecting type GITLAB. The GitLab group name that the workflow belongs to

pipelineVariables.description: The Gitlab pipeline variables should be in `JSON` format, encoded as a string. Use jsonencode to encode arrays or objects. condition.description: The `condition` field allows you to define rules using Port's [search & query syntax](https://docs.getport.io/search-and-query/#rules) to determine which entities the action will be available for.

body.description: The Webhook body should be in `JSON` format, encoded as a string. Use jsonencode to encode arrays or objects. Learn about how to [define the action payload](https://docs.getport.io/create-self-service-experiences/setup-backend/#define-the-actions-payload).

headers.description: The HTTP headers for invoking the action. They should be encoded as a key-value object to a string using jsonencode. Learn about how to [define the action payload](https://docs.getport.io/create-self-service-experiences/setup-backend/#define-the-actions-payload).

method.description: The HTTP method to invoke the action

url.description: Required when selecting type WEBHOOK. The URL to invoke the action

description.description: The description of the aggregation property

icon.description: The icon of the aggregation property

method.description: The aggregation method to perform on the target blueprint, one of count*entities, average*entities, average*by*property, aggregate*by*property

query.description: Query to filter the target entities

targetBlueprintIdentifier.description: The identifier of the blueprint to perform the aggregation on

title.description: The title of the aggregation property

aggregateByProperty.description: Function to calculate the aggregate by property value of the target entities, such as sum, min, max, median

averageByProperty.description: Function to calculate the average by property value of the target entities

averageEntities.description: Function to average the entities of the target entities

countEntities.description: Function to count the entities of the target entities

func.description: The func of the aggregate by property

property.description: The property of the aggregate by property

averageOf.description: The time periods to calculate the average by, e.g. hour, day, week, month

measureTimeBy.description: The property name on which to calculate the the time periods, e.g. $createdAt, $updated_at or any other date property

property.description: The property name on which to calculate the average by

averageOf.description: The time periods to calculate the average of, e.g. hour, day, week, month

measureTimeBy.description: The property name on which to calculate the the time periods, e.g. $createdAt, $updated_at or any other date property

provider.description:
The provider type for the port-labs package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

port:index/scorecard:Scorecard.description:
This resource allows you to manage a scorecard.

See the [Port documentation](https://docs.getport.io/promote-scorecards/) for more information about scorecards.

createdAt.description: The creation date of the scorecard

levels.description: The levels of the scorecard. This overrides the default levels (Basic, Bronze, Silver, Gold) if provided

updatedAt.description: The last update date of the scorecard

updatedBy.description: The last updater of the scorecard

port:index/getSearch:getSearch.description:
The search data source allows you to search for entities in Port.

See the [Port documentation](https://docs.getport.io/search-and-query/) for more information about the search capabilities in Port.

## Example Usage

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getSearch.

excludes.description: Properties to exclude from the results

includes.description: Properties to include in the results

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getSearch.

entities.description: A list of entities matching the search query

excludes.description: Properties to exclude from the results

includes.description: Properties to include in the results

matchingBlueprints.description: The matching blueprints for the search query
